solution_line_template: The number of cars in the back parking lot was {cars_front_parking_lot}*{multiplier_back_lot} = <<{cars_front_parking_lot}*{multiplier_back_lot}={cars_back_parking_lot}>>{cars_back_parking_lot} times more than those in the front parking lot.
There were {cars_back_parking_lot}+{cars_front_parking_lot} = <<{cars_back_parking_lot}+{cars_front_parking_lot}={total_cars_initial_sum}>>{total_cars_initial_sum} cars in the back parking lot.

A total of {total_cars_initial_sum}+{cars_front_parking_lot} = <<{total_cars_initial_sum}+{cars_front_parking_lot}={total_cars_before_play}>>{total_cars_before_play} cars were present before the play began

The total number of cars that parked in the theater during the play is {total_cars_end_play}-{total_cars_before_play} = <<{total_cars_end_play}-{total_cars_before_play}={cars_parked_during_play}>>{cars_parked_during_play} cars
